I purchased this for a 80's prom theme party.  It is a slim fit so if you are athletic build it will fit like a custom made jacket.  I bought a medium and it fit great ( I wear a sz 42 slim suit ) .  This is well made and not like the really cheap costume suits that look like plastic .

I checked the size chart before ordering.  It said XL was for a 50.5" chest measurement.  I figured I'd go this size since it was slim fit.  I usually wear a 46R or 48R in blazers/coats.  I could barely get this jacket on.  Fit more like I was trying to put on a 40R or 42R jacket.  I understand this is slim fit but I'd label it "extra slim" if the brand/seller are going to claim these measurements.  I ended up going with a 46R classic fit in another brand.

评论概述: Very colorful, but a plastic like material.
评论详情: I purchased this coat as a novelty.  It is very colorful, but the cloth it is made from is unpleasant to the touch and feels like plastic.  it will serve it's purpose, though.  I am going on a cruise that has nights where a person is supposed to different colors.  This coat has it covered.
I love this jacket. Style, fit, colour.

Great purchase for a fun fashion/themed event. The coat is well made for the price and looks fantastic. A couple of things you should note:  -there are no vents, so it won’t completely look bespoke -you will need to steam the creases out prior to wearing -the product runs small; I purchased a 3XL, my actual tailored suits are 48R with a lot of tailoring to bring everything in except for the shoulders and chest. This jacket doesn’t require any tailoring…. It’s not accurately sized so buy up.
This blazer is everything.

My husband loves this slightly silly whimsical jacket. Maybe a little too much. He tried to wear it to church on Easter morning.  I ordered this for him as more of a novelty than an actual wardrobe piece, but was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the material and construction of the garment. This could easily be worn to prom or a Mardi Gras style event without irony.  The only detraction and the reason I removed one star is the fit is not perfect. With out a standard dress cost measurement sizing I found for my 5'10" husband the chest of the Large jacket fit ok but the arms ended up a bit short. However, for the cost it is still a fun we'll made piece of clothing.

Purchased for my son’s 8th grade prom. At first I was a little skeptical but yeah he put it on, and was looking very dapper. However had we had the time I probably would have gotten a few alterations for a better fit but overall it turned out well. Very satisfied.

I wanted to wear a tuxedo jacket to an upcoming wedding in New Orleans. As Auntie of the Bride it was important not to embarrass her in her special day. But I do want to look fabulous. The length is perfect. I am 5’6” tall and weigh 120 pounds. I am going to wear a white ruffled tuxedo shirt. Tried it all on and I just say it looks fabulous.
These jackets will get attention and compliments. The look good with jeans, slacks or khakis.  You really can’t go wrong. Jackets fit great and are very well made. Great price and a solid purchase.

评论概述: Very nice and fun dressy jacket
评论详情: This does fit as expected, it's a bit snug on my husband but not enough to size up and is wearable as it is. This is made like a quality jacket. The pockets are nicely sewn and are stitched closed to keep them from damage. The fabric is nice, not high end, but for the price point I think it's nice. It came with extra buttons for both the front and sleeves. This would be a great jacket for a party like new years or fun even. The inside of the jacket has pockets on either side which I don't see all the time, so that is nice. The sewing is well done and I do not see any issues with stitching. So, if you want to make a statement this is the one for you. The fabric has a lovely light shift that would be fun in a club or multi light setting. Have some fun, get the jacket. :)
This jacket fits perfectly. It is so beautifully made. The designs are amazing. The material is not scratchy or aggravating at all. Its comfortable to wear and is versatile.

Not sure why the measurements on these are so wrong. I have a 44 chest and could not even button the large size jacket. Overall, it is lightweight and the colors are really bright. Looks like a quality item. probably would not have returned it if it actually fit.

With an all over floral design and a contrasting embroidered shawl collar, this tuxedo jacket is in one word... EXTRA. It is for the man who wants to make an entrance with all eyes on him.  The outer shell features a colorful satin sheen finish, a chest pocket, two front flap pockets, a single button closure, a back vent and 4 non-working buttons on the each sleeve. The inside is fully lined in a black matte finish and two inside piped pockets at the chest. Shoulder pads built into the lining are there to maintain structure.  It looks and feels like nice quality, but the size chart is not accurate. The XXL is stated as having a chest size of 53.5 inches in the size chart. I had my husband, who is a 52 Long jacket size, try it on for size and he was unable to button it. It looked good in torso length and sleeve length was spot on, but he said that it fit like a 48 or 50 around his chest.  Personally, as a woman, I found this jacket to be really attractive. Since it doesn't fit my husband, I am considering having it tailored to fit me.  100% polyester- hand wash and drip dry or dry clean only.
I love it will get more
